quote: There’s always a choice. That’s God’s way, always will be. Your will is still free. Do as you will. There’s no set of leg-irons on you. But... this is what God wants of you.
quote_letters: THERES ALWAYS A CHOICE THATS GODS WAY ALWAYS WILL BE YOUR WILL IS STILL FREE DO AS YOU WILL THERES NO SET OF LEG-IRONS ON YOU BUT THIS IS WHAT GOD WANTS OF YOU
